DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate bioequivalence sprinkle capsule formulation lubiprostone , compare placebo , administer orally subject CIC .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Bioequivalence Sprinkle Capsule Formulations Lubiprostone , Compared Placebo
DOC.criteria: Subject either medicallyconfirmed diagnosis chronic constipation ( per Rome III ) , meet diagnosis confirm use Rome III constipation module questionnaire Screening period . Subject male female , 18 old year age Subject must stable dose fiber supplement concomitant medication indication lower blood pressure Subject gastrointestinal ( GI ) condition , constipation , affect GI motility defecation . Subject unable eat drink , take oral medication , hold oral medication due vomit
